page.title: 17Crowthorne Public Services
page.content: {The Fire Station} Crowthorne Fire Station is a Class D which means it takes twenty minutes to get to a fire. It has four fully retained firemen and twelve more on call. Last year they were called out to 11 chimney fires, 6 forest fires, 40 open calls (cows in ditches,cats in trees, people locked out of houses),5 rescues (car crashes), 24 special services, 68 genuine false alarms and 13 pranks. They were on standby 161 times when another fire station had been called to a fire. { {The Police Station The station in the High Street has to serve the needs of 28000 people in the Crowthorne area.Our policeman said his job was to save lives, maintain law and order and catch criminals.He dealt with 6 or 7 calls a day.
